items.sentence: Because of his impolite reply, she got angry and slapped his face.
Does anybody have any medical problems that we need to know about?
I plan to get a hold of Tom by phone tomorrow and ask him to help.
The last time I ate at that restaurant the food wasn\'t very good.
Tom and Mary don\'t get along because they have nothing in common.
Tom asked Mary some questions, but she didn\'t answer any of them.
I may be unsociable, but it doesn\'t mean I don\'t talk to people.
I think it\'s time for me to spend a little time with my children.
I want you to tell me everything you know about what\'s happening.
It\'s possible that Tom may not know that Mary is in the hospital.
